hero.title: Transport services
hero.subtitle: unlimited possibilities
hero.description: We deliver logistics solutions that strengthen your business. You grow your business – we handle the logistics. Ship, track, and manage orders easily and conveniently!

tagline.title: We create domestic and international transport for you

services.title: Comprehensive transport & logistics services
services.subtitle: We offer a full range of transport and logistics services.
services.description: Your satisfaction is our priority! You always know where your shipment is and have contact with a dedicated account manager, and you can count on our support 24/7.

seaTransport.title: Sea transport
seaTransport.description1: We provide sea transport – container and general cargo – to over 100 countries worldwide.
seaTransport.description2: We take care of the full coordination of your transport – from loading at the port of origin to unloading at the destination port.

airTransport.title: Air transport
airTransport.description1: A flexible, fast, and secure method of organizing transport – even for high-value goods.
airTransport.description2: We operate on both door-to-door and airport-to-airport basis.

roadTransport.title: Road transport
roadTransport.description1: We deliver any cargo to any address across Europe – from full containers to smaller shipments (FTL/LTL).
roadTransport.description2: Truck transport using a wide fleet of vehicles – for transporting goods of any kind.

railTransport.title: Rail transport
railTransport.description1: Flexible freight transport services and an alternative to sea transport.
railTransport.description2: We provide transport of goods between Asia and Europe – from one carton to an entire train.

warehousing.title: Warehousing
warehousing.description1: We offer warehousing services during goods transport.
warehousing.description2: Everything in modern warehouse centers across the country and worldwide.

customsAgency.title: Customs agency
customsAgency.description1: Need a partner that provides transport services and customs services at the same time?
customsAgency.description2: We ensure smooth handling of even the most complex shipments worldwide and within the European Union.

whyChooseUs.title: Why
whyChooseUs.titleEnd: is the best choice for your business?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Because we will be a partner you can rely on in any situation.
whyChooseUs.description: We combine years of experience with modern solutions, and our freight forwarding services meet the highest international standards. Want to learn more and see why you should choose us?

comfort.title: Full comfort and security
comfort.description1: After placing an order, you can breathe easy – your transport is in good hands.
comfort.description2: We guarantee effective delivery, without the need for constant supervision. You get peace of mind and certainty that your goods will arrive on time, without any complications and in perfect condition.

trust.title: Trust and experience
trust.description1: Trust is built through effectiveness. We build it through solid and timely deliveries.
trust.description2: Every transport is a priority for us, and our experienced specialists take care of every detail – before you even think about them.

individual.title: Transport services with individual approach
individual.description1: Every business is different, which is why we focus on solutions tailored to your unique needs. Express transport, construction materials transport, furniture transport or from multiple locations to one place? No problem!
individual.description2: Whether you need fast local delivery or comprehensive international logistics – we'll create a plan that meets your most demanding expectations.

technology.title: Modern technology
technology.description1: Thanks to advanced shipment tracking systems, you have full control over your goods transport in real time.
technology.description2: Our logistics is based on innovative tools that ensure security and cost optimization for your business.

global.title: Global freight transport
global.description1: INF Shipping Solutions operates worldwide, giving us an advantage in organizing international transport.
global.description2: Our strength is an extensive partner network, thanks to which we ensure fast and efficient delivery of your shipments anywhere in the world.

ecology.title: Ecology and sustainable development
ecology.description1: We believe that responsibility for the future of our planet rests on all of us.
ecology.description2: By using our services, you can be sure that our transport solutions meet the highest environmental standards, and we continuously work to minimize our carbon footprint.

testimonials.title: What do our clients say?
testimonials.subtitle: You are not and never will be just another row in our spreadsheet!
testimonials.description: We focus on partner relationships! We care about the continuous growth of your business, lower logistics costs, and above all, the peace of mind you gain from transparent terms and a convenient transport management panel.

items.name: Beata Tymczewska
items.content: INF Shipping Solutions is a guarantee of safety and professionalism. We have been using their sea and rail transport services for several years, and their flexibility and commitment to customer service have never let us down.

items.name: Paulina Kita
items.content: INF impresses with excellent organization and care for the customer, offering services at the highest level. Thanks to their commitment, every stage runs smoothly, I receive regular updates about my shipment, and all this in a friendly atmosphere. Always smiling and willing to help!

items.name: Mei Yang
items.content: Thanks to INF Shipping Solutions, our export to the Far East runs smoothly. Their freight services are true professionalism – fast delivery times, competitive rates, and great logistics support.

cta.title: Join our satisfied customers
cta.description: Let's talk about your next transport. See for yourself how our cooperation can look.
cta.button: Get a quote for your next transport
cta.mainTitle: Transport and logistics services at the lowest price
cta.mainDescription: Regain peace of mind regarding the transport of your goods. Contact us and get a free quote today!

workWithUs.title: Work with us
workWithUs.description1: We focus on cooperation with people full of passion who believe that the path they follow leads to the very top.
workWithUs.description2: The best companies are created by the best employees, which is why recruitment at INF is always open – we are waiting for you!

freeQuote.title: Free transport quote
freeQuote.subtitle: Want to quickly and efficiently know the costs of your transport? Fill out the form below and get a free transport cost quote.

step1.title: Choose transport type
step1.description: Choose the type of transport you are interested in

step4.title: Contact details
step4.description: Enter your contact details so we can send you the quote

success.title: Thank you!
success.description: Your quote request has been successfully submitted. We will contact you within 24 hours.
